participant_1.background: i'm a librarian. i am 60 years old. i've visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: ambitious and confident, with a taste for luxury and a strong drive for success.
participant_2.background: i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan.
